mapper.select: SELECT u.name,l.IDnumber,l.checkID,l.capital,l.endDate,l.status from userinfo u,draft l where u.IDnumber = l.IDnumber and u.name=#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and l.status!='4'
select u.name,l.IDnumber,l.checkID,l.capital,l.endDate,l.status from userinfo u,draft l where u.IDnumber = l.IDnumber and u.IDnumber=#{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and l.status!='4'

select u.name,l.IDnumber,l.checkID,l.capital,l.endDate,l.status from userinfo u,draft l where u.IDnumber = l.IDnumber and u.name=#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and l.idNumber=#{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and l.status!='4'

select u.name,l.IDnumber,l.checkID,l.capital,l.endDate,l.status from userinfo u,draft l where u.IDnumber = l.IDnumber and l.status!='4' limit #{numPerPage,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{pageNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select u.name,l.loanType,l.proveFile,l.capital,l.cardID,l.IDnumber,l.status from userinfo u,loan l where u.IDnumber = l.IDnumber and l.status!='4' and l.idNumber=#{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
